name: MIS Prisoner Balances Report
description:
Lists all balances for all current prisoners (including those out of prison) for a specified account date and Caseload Id. Below the current prisoners' balances is a summary of any balances held for any non-current prisoners. Totals of all prisoner monies held by the prison are provided, split by current and non-current.
FIN0016 - v00.00.07

dataset.name: Current
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME, SUM(CASE WHEN (AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_ACCOUNTS.ACCOUNT_CODE) = '2102' THEN (AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE.GROSS_BALANCE) ELSE 0 END) AS SUM_OF_SPEND_ACCOUNT_OPENING36, SUM(CASE WHEN (AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_ACCOUNTS.ACCOUNT_CODE) = '2101' THEN (AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE.GROSS_BALANCE) ELSE 0 END) AS SUM_OF_PRIVATE_CASH_ACCOUNT_53, SUM(CASE WHEN (AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_ACCOUNTS.ACCOUNT_CODE) = '2103' THEN (AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE.GROSS_BALANCE) ELSE 0 END) AS SUM_OF_SAVINGS_ACCOUNT_OPENI38, SUM(COALESCE(CASE WHEN NOT AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_ACCOUNTS.ACCOUNT_CODE_SK IS NULL THEN AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE.HOLD_BALANCE END, 0)) AS SUM_OF_PRIVATE_CASH_ACCOUNT_51 FROM BODIMIS.FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_CASELOADS_OFF_HIST_BAL, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING, BODIMIS.DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_ACCOUNTS, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_HIST_BALANCE_DATES WHERE (AT_HIST_BALANCE_DATES.DATE_SK = AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE.BALANCE_DATE_SK) AND (AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE.ACCOUNT_CODE_SK = AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_ACCOUNTS.ACCOUNT_CODE_SK) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ALIAS_OFFENDER_SK = AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE.ALIAS_OFFENDER_SK AND AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.BOOKING_SEQ = 1) AND (AT_CASELOADS_OFF_HIST_BAL.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_) AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND ((AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND AT_CASELOADS_OFF_HIST_BAL.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK = (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_) AND AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK = (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_) AND (AT_HIST_BALANCE_DATES.DAY_DATE = TO_DATE(TO_DATE('07-02-2021 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS'), 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS'))) GROUP BY AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME HAVING (SUM(CASE WHEN (AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_ACCOUNTS.ACCOUNT_CODE) = '2102' THEN (AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE.GROSS_BALANCE) ELSE 0 END) <> 0 OR SUM(CASE WHEN (AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_ACCOUNTS.ACCOUNT_CODE) = '2101' THEN (AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE.GROSS_BALANCE) ELSE 0 END) <> 0 OR SUM(CASE WHEN (AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_ACCOUNTS.ACCOUNT_CODE) = '2103' THEN (AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE.GROSS_BALANCE) ELSE 0 END) <> 0 OR SUM(COALESCE(CASE WHEN NOT AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_ACCOUNTS.ACCOUNT_CODE_SK IS NULL THEN AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE.HOLD_BALANCE END, 0)) <> 0)), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, SURNAME, SUM_OF_SPEND_ACCOUNT_OPENING36, SUM_OF_PRIVATE_CASH_ACCOUNT_53, SUM_OF_SAVINGS_ACCOUNT_OPENI38, SUM_OF_PRIVATE_CASH_ACCOUNT_51, SUM(CURRENT.SUM_OF_PRIVATE_CASH_ACCOUNT_53 || CURRENT.SUM_OF_SPEND_ACCOUNT_OPENING36 || CURRENT.SUM_OF_SAVINGS_ACCOUNT_OPENI38 || CURRENT.SUM_OF_PRIVATE_CASH_ACCOUNT_51) AS V_CURR_BALANCE_INC_UNAVAIL, SUM(CURRENT.SUM_OF_PRIVATE_CASH_ACCOUNT_53 || CURRENT.SUM_OF_SPEND_ACCOUNT_OPENING36 || CURRENT.SUM_OF_SAVINGS_ACCOUNT_OPENI38) AS V_CURR_BALANCE_AVAIL FROM dataset_base_)

field.name: SUM_OF_PRIVATE_CASH_ACCOUNT_53
field.display: Sum of Private Cash Account Available Opening-Balance

field.name: SUM_OF_PRIVATE_CASH_ACCOUNT_51
field.display: Sum of Private Cash Account Holding Opening-Balance

dataset.name: All Prisoners
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT SUM(CASE WHEN (AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_ACCOUNTS.ACCOUNT_CODE) = '2101' THEN (AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE.GROSS_BALANCE) ELSE 0 END) AS SUM_OF_PRIVATE_CASH_ACCOUNT_53, SUM(CASE WHEN (AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_ACCOUNTS.ACCOUNT_CODE) = '2102' THEN (AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE.GROSS_BALANCE) ELSE 0 END) AS SUM_OF_SPEND_ACCOUNT_OPENING36, SUM(CASE WHEN (AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_ACCOUNTS.ACCOUNT_CODE) = '2103' THEN (AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE.GROSS_BALANCE) ELSE 0 END) AS SUM_OF_SAVINGS_ACCOUNT_OPENI38, SUM(COALESCE(CASE WHEN NOT AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_ACCOUNTS.ACCOUNT_CODE_SK IS NULL THEN AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE.HOLD_BALANCE END, 0)) AS SUM_OF_PRIVATE_CASH_ACCOUNT_51 FROM BODIMIS.FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE, BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_CASELOADS_OFF_HIST_BAL, BODIMIS.DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_ACCOUNTS, BODIMIS.DIM_DATE AT_HIST_BALANCE_DATES WHERE (AT_HIST_BALANCE_DATES.DATE_SK = AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE.BALANCE_DATE_SK) AND (AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE.ACCOUNT_CODE_SK = AT_DIM_ACCOUNT_CODE_ACCOUNTS.ACCOUNT_CODE_SK) AND (AT_CASELOADS_OFF_HIST_BAL.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_FACT_OFF_ACC_HIST_BALANCE.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_CASELOADS_OFF_HIST_BAL.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK = (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_) AND (AT_HIST_BALANCE_DATES.DAY_DATE = TO_DATE(TO_DATE('07-02-2021 00:00:00', 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS'), 'DD-MM-YYYY HH24:MI:SS')))), dataset_ AS (SELECT SUM_OF_PRIVATE_CASH_ACCOUNT_53, SUM_OF_SPEND_ACCOUNT_OPENING36, SUM_OF_SAVINGS_ACCOUNT_OPENI38, SUM_OF_PRIVATE_CASH_ACCOUNT_51 FROM dataset_base_)

field.name: SUM_OF_PRIVATE_CASH_ACCOUNT_53
field.display: Sum of Private Cash Account Available Opening-Balance

field.name: SUM_OF_PRIVATE_CASH_ACCOUNT_51
field.display: Sum of Private Cash Account Holding Opening-Balance

dataset.name: MIS Load
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.BUSINESS_DATE FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE (BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG.LOAD_ID = (SELECT MAX(LOAD_ID) FROM BODIMIS.ETL_LOAD_LOG WHERE NOT LOAD_END_DATETIME IS NULL))), dataset_ AS (SELECT BUSINESS_DATE FROM dataset_base_)

dataset.name: Bookings
dataset.query: dataset_base_ AS (SELECT AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.SURNAME FROM BODIMIS.DIM_ESTABLISHMENT AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP, BODIMIS.DIM_OFFENDER_BOOKING AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING WHERE (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK IN (SELECT CSL.OFFENDER_BOOKING_SK FROM BODIMIS.DIM_STAFF_ACCESSIBLE_CASELOAD SAC, BODIMIS.DIM_CASELOAD_SECURITY_LIST CSL WHERE SAC.CASELOAD_ID = CSL.CASELOAD_CODE AND SAC.USERNAME = (SELECT username FROM context_) AND CSL.ENDYEAR >= TO_CHAR(CURRENT_TIMESTAMP, 'YYYY') - 6)) AND (AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ESTABLISHMENT_SK = AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ESTABLISHMENT_SK) AND (AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND ((AT_OFFENDER_BOOKING.ACTIVE_FLAG = 'Y') AND AT_ESTABLISHMENT_TAP.ESTABLISHMENT_CODE_NK = (SELECT establishment_code FROM prompt_) AND ('Y' = 'Y'))), dataset_ AS (SELECT OFFENDER_ID_DISPLAY, SURNAME FROM dataset_base_)

field.name: $ref:SUM_OF_PRIVATE_CASH_ACCOUNT_53
field.display: Sum of Private Cash Account Available Opening-Balance

field.name: $ref:SUM_OF_PRIVATE_CASH_ACCOUNT_51
field.display: Sum of Private Cash Account Holding Opening-Balance

field.name: $ref:V_CURR_BALANCE_INC_UNAVAIL
field.legacySql: =Sum([Current].[Sum of Private Cash Account Available Opening-Balance]+[Current].[Sum of Spend Account Opening-Balance]+[Current].[Sum of Savings Account Opening-Balance]+[Current].[Sum of Private Cash Account Holding Opening-Balance])

field.name: $ref:V_CURR_BALANCE_AVAIL
field.legacySql: =Sum([Current].[Sum of Private Cash Account Available Opening-Balance]+[Current].[Sum of Spend Account Opening-Balance]+[Current].[Sum of Savings Account Opening-Balance])
